items.content_html: GitHub Enhancer is a Chrome extension designed to improve your GitHub browsing experience by offering enhanced contributor information and detailed date/time displays. Key features include customizable settings, enhanced contributor cards, full date/time displays for relative time elements, and a lightweight, fast performance.
items.title: adomorn/Github-Enhancer: GitHub Enhancer is a Chrome extension designed to improve your GitHub browsing experience by offering enhanced contributor information and detailed date/time displays. Key features include customizable settings, enhanced contributor cards, full date/time displays for relative time elements, and a lightweight, fast performance.

items.content_html: TaskHub is a lightweight and intuitive task management app designed to help you organize, prioritize, and complete your tasks efficiently. Whether you're managing personal to-dos, work projects, or team collaborations, TaskHub offers a seamless experience with powerful features that keep you on track.

items.content_html: The Lightweight Chat Application enables users to join chat rooms using a display name, interact with others in real-time, and exchange messages instantly. This project focuses on simplicity and real-time interaction using Socket.IO, which creates live connections between clients and the server.
